* Yes!! She had finally gotten what he was trying to say!
Though, his happyness was short lived when he heard the words to follow the 
first.
D almost couldn't believe it! They were dead, all dead?!
His ears pressed against his head and he whined, long and mournful. He bowed 
his head and sat there.
Even the woman who was so nice to him...dead.
He knew what death was and he didn't like it.
D heaved a sigh and looked out towards the edge of the island, wondering 
just where that ship was where the deaths of friends lingered.
But he knew better then to linger over death too much, wondering if he would 
make any friends here that might replace the ones he lost.
One never knew.
D looked at Fenox, slightly whining again. But he soon got to his feet and 
shook himself, still slightly saddened but thinking that dwelling on it 
wouldn't help. They were gone and there was nothing he could do about it.
He gestured towards the Iron Fist.*

" Show?"

* He wanted to see the inside, maybe meet some more of these beings of 
steel.*
